+ /**
+  * 
+  */
+ private fun formatDuration(millis: Long): String {
+     val hours = millis / (1000 * 60 * 60)
+     val minutes = (millis / (1000 * 60)) % 60
+     return when {
+         hours > 0 -> "${hours}${minutes}"
+         minutes > 0 -> "${minutes}"
+         else -> "1"
+     }
  }

 `formatDuration`  `EnhancedStatisticsScreen.kt`

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>



 formatDuration </details></think>

---

Tool use: **search_replace**


<details><summary>Edit file: d:\code\android_software\time\app\src\main\java\com\example\time\ui\statistics\EnhancedStatisticsScreen.kt</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 13, lines removed: undefined

```diff
@@ -597,4 +597,17 @@
      val duration: Duration
  )
+ 
+ /**
+  * 
+  */
+ private fun formatDuration(millis: Long): String {
+     val hours = millis / (1000 * 60 * 60)
+     val minutes = (millis / (1000 * 60)) % 60
+     return when {
+         hours > 0 -> "${hours}${if (minutes > 0) "${minutes}" else ""}"
+         minutes > 0 -> "${minutes}"
+         else -> "1"
+     }
+ }
  
  // 
```

</details>
